text: "Nothing, absolutely nothing, makes up for the sacrifice of a teenage girl's life", says Luder. That's why I hate those demon-possessed prophets who lead a whole generation of young people to martyrdom. For them, for them alone, the cruel punishments invented by the ancients would have to be redeemed: hanging them with their own beards and handing over their remains to the raven's voracity. Finished by Luder, 1989
title: Dichos de Luder 61
author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
